sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Formik, Form } from 'formik' import FormikControl from '../FormikControl/FormikControl' import * as Yup from 'yup' import {Button,Flex} from '@chakra-ui/react' function StudentRegister() { const initialValues = { "name": "", "enrollmentNo": "", "facultyNo": "", "email":"", "phoneNo": "", "courseName": "", } const onSubmit = values => { console.log(values); } const validationSchema = Yup.object({ name:Yup.string().required('name is required'), enrollmentNo: Yup.string().required('enrollment number is required'), facultyNo:Yup.string().required('faculty number is required'), email:Yup.string().required('email is required').email("Invalid email format"), phoneNo:Yup.number().required().positive().integer(), courseName:Yup.string().required() }) return ( { (formik) => { return (
) } } ) } export default StudentRegister {/*
*/}
